title: OneWeb aims to deploy a record 40 satellites in SpaceX mission
summary: OneWeb said SpaceX is slated to launch 40 of its satellites as early as Dec. 6 to complete almost 80% of its low Earth orbit broadband constellation.

title: Astra chief engineer resigns in another blow for beleaguered rocket builder
summary: Beleaguered rocket-builder Astra is losing its highly touted chief engineer, Benjamin Lyon, the company said in a securities filing Friday.

title: Rocket Report: SpaceX launch delayed indefinitely; Virgin Orbit cancels funding round
summary: "Due to current market conditions, the company has elected not to proceed."

title: FCC grants partial approval for Starlink second-generation constellation
summary: The FCC has partially approved SpaceX’s application for the second generation of its Starlink constellation, allowing the company to launch up to a quarter of the proposed 30,000 satellites while deferring action on the rest.

title: Orion begins return leg of Artemis 1 mission
summary: NASA’s Orion spacecraft started its trip back to Earth Dec. 1 with the first of two maneuvers that will put the spacecraft on course for a splashdown in the Pacific Ocean in a week and a half.
